r.d: The Log package provides an abstracted logging framework. It includes output handlers for log files, databases, syslog, email, Firebug, and the console. It also provides composite and subject-observer logging mechanisms.
r.n: The syslog handler's maximum message length is now configurable via a new 'maxLength' configuration variable. If the handler receives a message longer than this length limit, it will be split into multiple syslog() calls.
